info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HABERSHAM COUNTY UNTIL 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 10 miles northwest of Homer, or over Alto, moving southeast at 10 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Baldwin, Alto and Raoul. Rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
